title: muttukkumarayyan
sahitya:
muttukkumarayyan cittam urugik-karaiya bhaktiyuDanE tudittu mukti peru manamE nI


anupallavi

  nittam avan kazhalaDi nizhal nADi nilaittu nimmadiyurum vAzhvai kumbiTTup-peruvAyE


caraNam    ettanaiyO unakku iDar vanda pOdilum attanaiyum aghanriDa aruL purindiDuvAn
uttama bhaktarukku urutuNai purindiDum attan Aghum avanai ottiDuvOrillayE
